title: Loops
mission_log: Multiple alarms are triggered. Loop through them to deactivate.
challenge: Print numbers 1 to 5 using a loop.
hints: Loop from 1 to 5 using: for i in range(1, 6):
The range(1, 6) means start at 1, stop before 6 (so 1,2,3,4,5)
Print each number: print(i) - make sure it's indented under the for loop
